metadata.titleDefault: Vento Caffè | Premium Coffee Cialde Delivered Monthly
metadata.description: Premium Italian coffee cialde delivered monthly. Get a FREE espresso machine when you subscribe. Authentic espresso at home, made simple.

hero.description: Premium coffee cialde delivered monthly. Commit to a box per month, and we'll give you the espresso machine for FREE.

directOffer.headline: FREE Espresso Machine
directOffer.whatsappMessage: Hi! I want to order the €55 cialde box with the free espresso machine!

brandStatement.heading: Authentic Italian espresso, delivered to your door.
brandStatement.subheading: Premium cialde. Free machine. Monthly convenience.

freeMachineOffer.heading: Free Espresso Machine
freeMachineOffer.description: Commit to purchasing just 1 cialde box per month, and we'll give you a professional espresso machine completely FREE. No hidden fees, no contracts—just great coffee.
benefits: No upfront cost for the machine
freeMachineOffer.whatsappMessage: Hi! I'm interested in the free espresso machine offer with monthly cialde subscription.

paragraphs: We are Vento Caffè, bringing authentic Italian espresso directly to your home or office. Our mission is simple: make premium coffee accessible and convenient through our cialde subscription service.

We believe everyone deserves a perfect espresso. That's why we offer our professional espresso machine FREE when you commit to a monthly cialde box. No complicated contracts, no hidden fees—just great coffee delivered to your door.

footer.tagline: Premium coffee cialde delivered monthly. Free machine with subscription.
footer.bottomLine: Take your time. Enjoy your espresso.

steps.title: Choose Your Cialde
steps.description: Select Classic or Decaffeinato box (150 cialde + kit)

steps.title: Get Free Machine
steps.description: Commit to monthly orders and receive your espresso machine FREE

steps.title: Enjoy & Reorder
steps.description: Enjoy perfect espresso and easily reorder via WhatsApp or online

contact.heading: Get Started
contact.subheading: Contact us to set up your subscription
contact.whatsappMessage: Hi! I'm interested in starting a cialde subscription.

classicCialde.name: Classic Cialde Box
classicCialde.description: Our signature blend of premium Italian coffee, carefully selected and roasted to perfection. Each cialde delivers a rich, full-bodied espresso with notes of chocolate and toasted nuts. The perfect everyday coffee for true espresso lovers.

decaffeinatoCialde.name: Decaffeinato Cialde Box
decaffeinatoCialde.description: All the flavor, none of the caffeine. Our decaffeinated cialde use a natural Swiss Water process to remove caffeine while preserving the complex flavors of premium Arabica beans. Enjoy authentic Italian espresso any time of day.

espressoMachine.name: Espresso Machine
espressoMachine.description: A professional-grade ESE pod espresso machine designed for simplicity and quality. Compact, elegant, and powerful—brew barista-quality espresso at home or in the office with the push of a button. No mess, no waste, just perfect coffee.

shopPage.metaDescription: Premium Italian coffee cialde delivered monthly. Get a FREE espresso machine when you subscribe to monthly deliveries.
shopPage.title: Shop
shopPage.description: Choose your preferred cialde box and enjoy premium Italian espresso at home. Subscribe monthly and get your espresso machine for free.
shopPage.infoCardDescription: When you commit to ordering at least 1 cialde box per month, we'll send you this professional espresso machine completely free.

aboutPage.metaDescription: We are Vento Caffè, bringing authentic Italian espresso directly to your home or office through our cialde subscription service.

quality.title: Quality
quality.description: We source only premium Italian coffee, carefully selected and processed into ESE pods that deliver consistent, barista-quality espresso every time.

convenience.title: Convenience
convenience.description: Monthly delivery means you never run out of coffee. Our simple subscription model includes everything you need—cialde, cups, sugar, and stirrers.

value.title: Value
value.description: Get a professional espresso machine completely free when you subscribe. No upfront cost, no hidden fees—just great coffee delivered to your door.

cta.title: Ready to get started?
cta.description: Contact us today to set up your monthly cialde subscription and receive your free espresso machine.

informationCollect.title: Information We Collect
informationCollect.body: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you create an account, make a purchase, sign up for our newsletter, or contact us for support.

useInformation.title: How We Use Your Information
useInformation.body: We use the information we collect to process your orders, communicate with you, and improve our services.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.body: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at hello@ventocaffe.com

shipping.title: Shipping & Returns
shipping.description: Shipping and return policy for Vento Caffè

shipping.title: Shipping
shipping.body: We ship throughout Europe. Standard delivery takes 2-3 business days within Italy and 4-7 business days for the rest of Europe.

freeShipping.title: Free Shipping
freeShipping.body: Free shipping on all orders over €50 within Italy and €75 for the rest of Europe.

returns.title: Returns
returns.body: Due to the perishable nature of our products, we cannot accept returns on coffee. If you receive a damaged or incorrect product, please contact us within 48 hours of delivery.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.body: If you have any questions about shipping or returns, please contact us at hello@ventocaffe.com

terms.title: Terms & Conditions
terms.description: Terms and conditions for Vento Caffè

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.body: By accessing and using this website, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement.

pricing.title: Products and Pricing
pricing.body: All prices are in Euros and include applicable taxes. We reserve the right to modify prices at any time without prior notice.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.body: If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us at hello@ventocaffe.com
